channel.title: Posts on Hello Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hello Hugo

item.title: Second Post
item.description: This is the second post. Let’s see what else you can do with markdown. Here is a link to Google! Here is making some text bold. So actually that wasn’t a heading as referred to in my first post. Nice so the relative linking works as evidenced above. I am referring to this mastering markdown guide. Here is a numbered list: 1. Hi 2. How 3. Are 4. You 5. Doing?

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello world from Hugo. This is some markdown. The usual markdown rules apply. Here is some bolded text Here is an italicized piece of text Here is an image from local:
